___language.description: the set of languages used by the resource

___lastModified.description: date/time when this resource was last modified

___title.description: the primary title (or label) associated with the resource

___publisher.description: name of publisher of the resource

___subject.description: list of subjects this resource belongs to

___source.description: a label indicating the source of the recent, e.g. kb, local

___series.description: a series title associated with the resource (e.g. Harry Potter)

___rights.description: access rights associated with the resource

___altTitle.description: an alternative title for the resource. (e.g. original language version title of a movie)

___identifier.description: an extensible set of name-value pairs of identifiers associated with the resource

___date.description: the date of publication of the resource

___contributor.description: list of contributors to the resource

___name.description: name of contributor to the resource

___type.description: type of contributor to the resource

___id.description: the ID of the original record within its own database: since these come from various sources they may take different forms, e.g. integer, UUID
